headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.gstatic.com https://unpkg.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://unpkg.com https://fonts.googleapis.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; connect-src 'self' https://firestore.googleapis.com https://securetoken.googleapis.com https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com; img-src 'self'  https:; frame-ancestors 'none';
